A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I wasn't sure how I felt when I first saw the film but there are some powerful themes that come through like a slow burn once you start thinking about the film and giving it time to process - although I don't want to give spoilers away. In regards to the poor reviews many users have given it I would say that many people complained about TFA\, which I think is a fine film\, for being a mimic of ANH. TLJ is a bold movie on the other hand\, and that's what Star Wars films are meant to be.
